title: Memmory Card Game
description: This is a project made to keep track of how many cards you get in a row and try to reach the high score.

title: Studio Ghibli API
description: This is a project made to search and filter through all the Ghibli films by Date, Rating, and Director.

title: Pokedex API
description: This is a project made to filter and search through a Pokemon GO database.
